mapper.select: SELECT pei.pre_no, pt.prt_name, pe.pre_qty, pe.ins_qty, pe.pre_date, pe.pre_manager, ee.emp_name FROM produce_inf pei JOIN product pt ON pei.prt_code = pt.prt_code JOIN produce pe ON pe.pre_no = pei.pre_no JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = pe.pre_manager WHERE pei.pre_yn = 'Y'

SELECT ma.mat_code, ma.mat_name, lo.lot_qty FROM material ma JOIN process pr ON ma.prs_code = pr.prs_code JOIN process_run prr ON prr.prs_code = pr.prs_code JOIN mat_out mo ON prr.mat_out_no = mo.mat_out_no JOIN lot lo ON lo.lot_no = mat_lot_no JOIN produce_inf pi ON pi.prs_code = pr.prs_code WHERE pi.pre_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE produce_inf SET pre_yn = 'E' WHERE pre_no = (SELECT pre_no FROM produce WHERE pre_qty = ins_qty)
